author: DeAsia Paige
title: CONCERT REVIEW: Lil Baby hosts an epic birthday party
text:
Earlier this year, when Lil Baby announced his first multi-city tour as a solo headliner, fans were stunned that there werenâ€™t any Atlanta dates. In fact, before the â€œItâ€™s Only Usâ€ tour began, the Oakland City native quietly canceled 10 dates and dropped Kid LaRoi as an opening act â€” leading some to speculate about low ticket sales. The canceled dates even led to debates online about whether he can carry his own tour.
Sure, heâ€™s one of the top-selling rappers, but is he a good performer?
At his third annual Lil Baby & Friends Birthday Celebration, the answer was undoubtedly yes. Wednesday nightâ€™s show at State Farm Arena proved that he no only has the captivating stage presence, but he has the love from friends and industry peers to help him along the way. For the rapper, who was born on Dec. 3, the concert was the epitome of a grand birthday party thatâ€™d make anyone envious if they werenâ€™t invited.
It must be said that the concert had a 7 p.m. start time and Lil Baby didnâ€™t appear on stage until a few minutes before 10 p.m. (Memphis rapper Gloss Up, one of the supporting acts for the â€œItâ€™s Only Usâ€ tour, opened the show around 8 p.m. with a 30-minute set that slightly alleviated the long wait). The wait was so perplexing that some fans even wondered if any of his friends would show up at all.
Lil baby and his friends must fell out??
â€” a pisces gworlll ðŸ’–ðŸ’˜ðŸ’•âœ¨ðŸŒ‘ (@lolyesimlying) December 28, 2023 But all the doubt subsided as soon as Lil Baby graced the stage. Suddenly, the long wait didnâ€™t seem to matter anymore as the sold-out crowd rapped along to opening tracks like â€œStand on It,â€ â€œMy Dawgâ€ and â€œSouthside.â€ Wearing a red leather jacket and pants to match, he seamlessly embodied the persona of a rap superstar whoâ€™ll always be adored in Atlanta. And that adoration is reciprocal. The concert felt like a love letter to the Atlanta fans whoâ€™ve made Lil Baby one of the biggest rappers in the world.
Explore PHOTOS: Lil Baby draws star power for birthday bash Last yearâ€™s Lil Baby & Friends Birthday Celebration featured appearances from Drake, Lil Yachty and more. This yearâ€™s show carried the same level of star power. Rappers like Quavo, Rob49, Hunxho, 2 Chainz and Rylo Rodriguez â€” who was met with fans rapping every word to his hit â€œEqual Dirtâ€â€” took the stage earlier in the show. In between those sets, Lil Baby continued the momentum by performing songs like â€œPure Cocaineâ€ and â€œSum 2 Prove.â€
Credit: Robb Cohen for the Atlanta Journ
Credit: Robb Cohen for the Atlanta Journ
And if that wasnâ€™t enough, R&B crooner Fridayy, Detroit rappers 42 Dugg and Veeze, 21 Savage and Lil Durk (who performed DJ Khaledâ€™s â€œEvery Chance I Getâ€ with Lil Baby) also hit the stage. The highlight of the night arrived when J. Cole performed hits like â€œMiddle Childâ€ and â€œNo Role Modelz.â€
The show ended with final appearances from the City Girlsâ€™ Yung Miami and Atlanta singer Jacquees. Dressed in all-black this time, Lil Baby concluded the night with his hit â€œFreestyle.â€ But he didnâ€™t even need to perform the song. The crowd performed it for him, rapping each verse with the fervor of knowing that the hit is indeed an anthemic track for Atlanta hip-hop.
Lil Baby is Atlanta rapâ€™s star of the moment. With three no. 1 albums (his latest, â€œItâ€™s Only Me,â€ was released in 2022) and more than a dozen top 10 hits under his belt, the 29-year-old rapper has become a household name in less than five years. Wednesday nightâ€™s show was a stunning celebration full of surprises that proved the secret to Lil Babyâ€™s skyrocketing success is his unyielding fanbase.
Related Credit: Henri Hollis
Review: Rapperâ€™s Atlanta seafood spot is casual, messy and fun About the Author
DeAsia Paige DeAsia is an award-winning music and culture journalist whose work has been featured in Pitchfork, NPR Music, Teen Vogue and more. She focuses on the intersection of arts, culture, and diverse communities, as well as how emerging social trends are being expressed through the lens of the Atlanta aesthetic.

author: March ; A Falun Dafa Practitioner
title: People in Napoli Learn the Facts About Falun Gong | Falun Dafa - Minghui.org
text: (Minghui.org) Falun Gong (also called Falun Dafa) practitioners in Italy held introductory activities in the Vomero District of Napoli, the third largest city in Italy, on March 24, 2024. Many local residents were informed about the benefits of Falun Gong and became interested. Practitioners also exposed the Chinese Communist Partyâ€™s (CCP) persecution of Falun Gong. [Falun Gong practitioners held introductory activities in the Vomero District of Napoli, Italy.](/u/article_images/2024-3-26-italy-vomero-01.jpg) Despite the cold weather, many pedestrians stopped to read the display boards, talked with Falun Gong practitioners, and condemned the CCPâ€™s brutal violations of human rights. They were astonished to learn that practitioners following the principles of Truthfulness-Compassion-Forbearance had been imprisoned, tortured, and their organs harvested for transplant surgeries. [Falun Gong practitioners tell people the facts about their cultivation practice.](/u/article_images/2024-3-26-italy-vomero-06.jpg) Many thanked the practitioners for telling them what was happening in China. A woman journalist asked for Falun Gong group exercise times and locations, and wanted to learn the exercises. Copyright Â© 2024 Minghui.org. All rights reserved.

author: Josephfer Williams Jr
title: Mosaic Life Care and Missouri Western State University Nursing enter new partnership | News | kq2.com
text: (ST. JOSEPH, Mo.) On Nov. 11, 2024, Missouri Western State University's Nursing Program and Mosaic Life Care entered a new partnership to provide financial, academic and career support to nursing students. Mosaic and the university will cover three years of tuition for students and give them opportunities to work at Mosaic, thanks to the Nursing Scholars of Promise (NSP) program. Missouri Western State University President Elizabeth Kennedy said "Even though Missouri Western has the fourth lowest cost tuition in the state, reducing cost is always one of our goals. So talking with Mosaic and looking at what their needs were, you know, so many of our graduates go into Mosaic to work." "They'll have a special mentor, and this will be someone who will help them academically when they begin as freshmen, to make sure that they're doing well in their courses. They'll also have the opportunity to work part time at Mosaic, 12 hours a week during the academic year and summer, if that works out, which is always helpful for our students," Kennedy concluded. With the new partnership, Mosaic Life Care CEO, Mike Poore, is excited to continue using the hospital as a learning environment for students. Poore said "If you're able to work in the hospital, you understand that a nurse is not a nurse. That's not a nurse. There are oncology nurses and intensive care nurses and (OR) nurses, and the ability to work in the hospital before you become a nurse, gets you to understand where your interest may be and focus on what you wanted to be as a nurse getting out. "I mean, I'll hire every nurse that graduates from here. They have such a great program. You know, we talked about the NCLEX, 100% pass rate that really talks to the quality of nurse that we have here, but more of it too is that these students actually get to work inside our hospital, that they'll have opportunities to work inside our hospital," Poore concluded. For more on the Missouri Western Nursing Program, you can visit their website by clicking [HERE](https://www.missouriwestern.edu/nursing/)

author: Redazione
title: Monza corsaro al Ferraris, Genoa battuto per 3-2
text:
GENOVA (ITALPRESS) - Una vittoria fondamentale per chiudere con largo anticipo il discorso salvezza. Il Monza vince 3-2 contro il Genoa dopo la rimonta subita dai padroni di casa, decisiva la rete di Daniel Maldini che regala la decima vittoria stagionale a Raffaele Palladino. Nel prossimo turno i brianzoli sfideranno il Cagliari. I liguri, ancora a +10 sul Sassuolo e sul terz'ultimo posto, sfideranno la Juventus. La gara del Ferraris si Ã¨ infiammata immediatamente, alla prima vera occasione la squadra di Palladino Ã¨ passata in vantaggio: assist di testa di Colpani all'8' del primo tempo, per Pessina Ã¨ stato semplicissimo ribadire in rete. Il vantaggio dei lombardi ha scosso i padroni di casa, dopo dieci minuti Dany Mota si Ã¨ inventato un gol da copertina, sempre su assist di Colpani: sforbiciata dal limite e pallone praticamente imparabile per Martinez. Al 26' i biancorossi, in maglia bianca da trasferta, hanno sfiorato la terza rete con una conclusione violenta dalla distanza da parte dello stesso Colpani, il pallone perÃ² si Ã¨ schiantato sul palo grazie anche alla deviazione del portiere rossoblÃ¹. Viste le premesse, Gilardino nella ripresa ha stravolto la squadra con tre cambi, Spence, Malinovskyi e Vitinha sono entrati rispettivamente al posto di Vogliacco, Strootman e Frendrup. Il nuovo assetto tattico ha sorpreso gli ospiti, al 6' di gioco Feliciani, richiamato dal Var, ha assegnato un calcio di rigore al Grifone per un fallo di mano di Pablo MarÃ¬: dal dischetto Gudmundsson si Ã¨ fatto prima ipnotizzare da Di Gregorio, poi sulla respinta l'islandese ha accorciato le distanze. Il pareggio Ã¨ arrivato al 23' dopo un errore in mediana di Akpa-Apro, Vitinha ha preso palla sulla trequarti per poi inventarsi il piazzato sul palo lontano. Nel momento migliore del Genoa il Monza Ã¨ tornato nuovamente in vantaggio con una ripartenza fulminea, sul tiro di Valentin Carboni - respinto da Martinez -, il piÃ¹ veloce Ã¨ stato Daniel Maldini, entrato in campo da pochi minuti. In pieno recupero i padroni di casa hanno sfiorato la rete in una mischia confusa nell'area avversaria, ma Di Gregorio Ã¨ riuscito a tenere il pallone sulla linea.- Foto Image -(ITALPRESS).
